description:
Entirely terrestrial protected areas of the entire ACP region (79 countries plus S. Sudan, plus disputed territories) (source IUCN and UNEP-WCMC (2015), The World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) [On-line], [July 2015], Cambridge, UK: UNEP-WCMC. Available at: www.protectedplanet.net.

Includes all PAs with Marine = 0. Combines polygons and buffered points.
name: Terrestrial Protected Areas of Africa, Caribbean, Pacific (ACP)
